V.translation[0].definitions[0].definiti: the 22nd letter of the English alphabet
V.translation[0].definitions[1].definiti: the number 5 in the system of roman numerals
V.translation[0].definitions[2].definiti: something that has a shape like the letter V
V.translation[0].definitions[2].example[: She cut the material into a V.
V.translation[1].definitions[2].definiti: a written abbreviation of versus (=against), used in the names of legal  trials, or in Britain when talking about games in which two teams or players play against each other
V.translation[1].definitions[3].definiti: the written abbreviation of volt or  volts
